meanings.definition: A type of alkaloid found in cinchona bark.
meanings.sent1: The cinchonines in the bark help in treating malaria.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist studied the properties of cinchonines in cinchona bark.
meanings.sent3: The cinchonines in the bark had a party with the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of cinchonines was as deep as the roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cinchonines lingered in the air, reminding her of the forest.
